attributes.action: Stop sarah warrington signing petitions that she knows nothing about.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for too long sarah has been whinging about the air conditioning in our ICT classroom, but now she has sunk to a new low. she has signed a petition to stop a speed camera being put up in a place she has never been, and for something that will never ever affect her in her whole life. please refrain from her being on this website, or better still, make silly petitions for her to sign, which will rattle mr newbolds cage, while he is being greeted by a standing ovation by the class!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
